verses.roman:
kṛṣṇa-nāma la-ite tomāra 'ardha-bāhya' ha-ila
tāte ye pralāpa kailā, tāhā ye śunila"

synonyms: kṛṣṇa-nāma la-ite—chanting the holy name of Kṛṣṇa; tomāra—Your; ardha-bāhya—half-consciousness; ha-ila—there was; tāte—thereafter; ye—whatever; pralāpa—crazy talks; kailā—You did; tāhā—that; ye—which; śunila—have heard.
translation: "When we chanted the holy name of Kṛṣṇa, however, You came to semiconsciousness, and we have all been hearing You speak like a madman."
